title: unknown directX error
body:
i just installed LoL and when I log in everything is fine, but going into loading screen i get the message that my video driver isnt up to date. i went to update it and said it was up to date

i deleted the config folder as well as the lol_client and lol_client_en_us and repaired it but still nothing.

my adapter is the Standard VGA Graphics Adapter, can someone please help, ive been waiting three months to play only to get these problems

replies.body:
Heyo ProC Albel!

It really sucks having issues that prevent you from playing League of Legends. With this error in particular, I would recommend going through the [**Bug Splat and Game Crashes**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Riot Games Support article, as it's likely a computer issue rather than a client issue. Please keep me updated!
i have tried to update and it says i'm up to date
